greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Largest m<=n such that no carry occurs when adding m to n in decimal arithmetic.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9999
program: a167831 n = head [x | let ds = a031298_row n, x <- [n, n-1 ..],
xref: Cf. A167877, A035327 for the ternary and binary cases.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 14 2009
